name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: Prj Plugin - Project, Document, and Task Management

scripts.dev: concurrently "node esbuild.config.mjs" "npm run watch:sass" "node copy-plugin-files.mjs watch"
scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run compile:sass && node copy-plugin-files.mjs release
scripts.postversion: npm run build && node copy-plugin-files.mjs release && git add manifest.json versions.json package.json
